DESCRIPTION: is the base Linux image for Debian machines.
provides essential packages for building packages from source code.
is a network manager.
is a better version of `cat`.
is a package for transferring data from URLs.
is a fuzzy finder tool.
is a distributed version control system.
is a package for public-key cryptography.
is a graphical system monitor.
is an extensive terminal file manager.
is a package for managing logical volumes.
is a package for transferring and syncing files.
is a package that enables a user to utilize secure shells.
is a package that enables a user to rapidly deploy config files as symlinks.
is a package that allows non-root users to use commands as if they were the root user.
is a terminal multiplexer.
is a package that lists files in a graphically helpful way.
enables previews in the `lf` file manager.
is a text editor.
is a shell.
enables syntax highlighting in `zsh`.
